name: 45 Seconds Before
description:
The first Level after you collect items go down to the lowest level and click e anywere except elevator and all the way to other side

Game made for GIAW  (Game in a week)Jam
Theme is Everyone Is Dead

To understand what i did for the theme you gotta beat the first level

Its a puzzle game were you need to find and collect items to beat levels

There is only 1 level and i dont think there will be more because its so boring to make for me and its mostly copy and paste and most doors dont work.

___________________________________________

Made by me (PotatoEZ)

Music by Hank -  https://hankworx.itch.io/
